User: registration form e-commerce site
Assistant: <Form {...form}>
  <form onSubmit={form.handleSubmit(onSubmit)} className="space-y-6">
    <FormField
      control={form.control}
      name="email"
      render={({ field }) => (
        <FormItem>
          <FormLabel>Email</FormLabel>
          <FormControl>
            <Input type="email" placeholder="Email" {...field} />
          </FormControl>
          <FormMessage />
        </FormItem>
      )}
    />
    <FormField
      control={form.control}
      name="password"
      render={({ field }) => (
        <FormItem>
          <FormLabel>Password</FormLabel>
          <FormControl>
            <Input type="password" placeholder="Password" {...field} />
          </FormControl>
          <FormMessage />
        </FormItem>
      )}
    />
    <Button type="submit" className="w-full" disabled={{{loading}}}>{{submit_label}}</Button>
  </form>
</Form>

  <form onSubmit={form.handleSubmit(onSubmit)} className="space-y-6">
    <FormField
      control={form.control}
      name="email"
      render={({ field }) => (
        <FormItem>
          <FormLabel>Email</FormLabel>
          <FormControl>
            <Input type="email" placeholder="Email" {...field} />
          </FormControl>
          <FormMessage />
        </FormItem>
      )}
    />
    <FormField
      control={form.control}
      name="password"
      render={({ field }) => (
        <FormItem>
          <FormLabel>Password</FormLabel>
          <FormControl>
            <Input type="password" placeholder="Password" {...field} />
          </FormControl>
          <FormMessage />
        </FormItem>
      )}
    />
    <Button type="submit" className="w-full" disabled={{{loading}}}>{{submit_label}}</Button>
  </form>
</Form>

User: pagination e-commerce site
Assistant: <Pagination>
  <PaginationContent>
    <PaginationItem>
      <PaginationPrevious 
        href="{{previous_href}}"
        onClick={{{onPrevious}}}
        disabled={{{!has_previous}}}
      />
    </PaginationItem>
    {{{pages}}.map(page => (
      <PaginationItem key={page}>
        <PaginationLink 
          href="{{base_href}}?page={{page}}"
          isActive={page === {{current_page}}}
        >
          {page}
        </PaginationLink>
      </PaginationItem>
    ))}
    <PaginationItem>
      <PaginationNext 
        href="{{next_href}}"
        onClick={{{onNext}}}
        disabled={{{!has_next}}}
      />
    </PaginationItem>
  </PaginationContent>
</Pagination>

        onClick={{{onPrevious}}}
        disabled={{{!has_previous}}}
      />
    </PaginationItem>

      <PaginationItem key={page}>

          href="{{base_href}}?page={{page}}"
          isActive={page === {{current_page}}}
        >
          {page}
        </PaginationLink>
      </PaginationItem>
    ))}
    <PaginationItem>
      <PaginationNext 
        href="{{next_href}}"
        onClick={{{onNext}}}
        disabled={{{!has_next}}}
      />
    </PaginationItem>
  </PaginationContent>
</Pagination>

      <DropdownMenuItem key={item.value} onClick={item.onClick}>
        {item.icon && <item.icon className="mr-2 h-4 w-4" />}

      </DropdownMenuItem>
    ))}
  </DropdownMenuContent>
</DropdownMenu>

    <Button variant="outline">{{trigger_label}}</Button>
  </DropdownMenuTrigger>
  <DropdownMenuContent>
    <DropdownMenuLabel>{{label}}</DropdownMenuLabel>
    <DropdownMenuSeparator />
    {{{items}}.map(item => (
      <DropdownMenuItem key={item.value} onClick={item.onClick}>
        {item.icon && <item.icon className="mr-2 h-4 w-4" />}
        {item.label}
      </DropdownMenuItem>
    ))}
  </DropdownMenuContent>
</DropdownMenu>

User: login form for product listings and shopping cart
Assistant: <Form {...form}>
  <form onSubmit={form.handleSubmit(onSubmit)} className="space-y-6">
    <FormField
      control={form.control}
      name="email"
      render={({ field }) => (
        <FormItem>
          <FormLabel>Email</FormLabel>
          <FormControl>
            <Input type="email" placeholder="Email" {...field} />
          </FormControl>
          <FormMessage />
        </FormItem>
      )}
    />
    <FormField
      control={form.control}
      name="password"
      render={({ field }) => (
        <FormItem>
          <FormLabel>Password</FormLabel>
          <FormControl>
            <Input type="password" placeholder="Password" {...field} />
          </FormControl>
          <FormMessage />
        </FormItem>
      )}
    />
    <Button type="submit" className="w-full" disabled={{{loading}}}>{{submit_label}}</Button>
  </form>
</Form>

User: pagination for product listings and shopping cart
Assistant: <Pagination>
  <PaginationContent>
    <PaginationItem>
      <PaginationPrevious 
        href="{{previous_href}}"
        onClick={{{onPrevious}}}
        disabled={{{!has_previous}}}
      />
    </PaginationItem>
    {{{pages}}.map(page => (
      <PaginationItem key={page}>
        <PaginationLink 
          href="{{base_href}}?page={{page}}"
          isActive={page === {{current_page}}}
        >
          {page}
        </PaginationLink>
      </PaginationItem>
    ))}
    <PaginationItem>
      <PaginationNext 
        href="{{next_href}}"
        onClick={{{onNext}}}
        disabled={{{!has_next}}}
      />
    </PaginationItem>
  </PaginationContent>
</Pagination>
